title: Best of The Herd for Oct 12, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Oct 12, 2020
description:
-LeBron James is the greatest foundational piece in sports history

-Dak Prescott's injury is awful but this Cowboys team has problems beyond his injury

-The Vikings made a bad decision to go for it against Russell Wilson

-LeBron has changed how we look at an athlete's prime

-Where Colin was right, where Colin was wrong


Guest: Kevin Clark, The Ringer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
